# Proposal

## Research topic
Our research mainly focuses on the impact of COVID-19 on Chinese and global economy. After the outbreak in 2020, COVID-19 pandemic has had many adverse effects on the economy. We want to explore countries' economic status before and during COVID-19 using indexes as follows. 

## Data availability

For the Covid-19 data, we download data from Harvard Dataverse (https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/MR5IJN), and we will use the provinceConfirmed, provinceDeath, provinceRecover data from it.

For the provincial time-series economics data in China, we download data from China National Bureau of Statistics (https://data.stats.gov.cn/easyquery.htm?cn=G0104). For analysis of COVID-19's impact to USD index, use time series data that range from 2018.10.31 to 2022.10.31, and we download it from Investing.com.
